name: Drum - Art Deco lighting, Oversized Drum Geometric Lamp Shade
description:
The Drum lamp shade captures the art deco style through contemporary design. This piece of lighting offers a dramatic centerpiece for living areas; destined to impress. Perfect for those who love to entertain and desire ambient light for relaxation.

The geometric dashed cut sections of pattern form a striking silhouette yet highlight the beautiful natural texture of the vellum beneath. Vellum was traditionally used to line pre war lampshades. This paper-based material is specially sourced to emulate the authentic aesthetic of vintage vellum yet manufactured to UK lighting safety standards.

The polypropylene sheet and vellum are laser cut from materials carefully selected by our supplier in Manchester. We then personally hand assemble them in our Liverpool studio through their unique clipping mechanisms to metal lamp shade rings; sourced from our supplier's factory in Hackney, London. 

We then package each light shade individually in our bespoke Token Homewares recycled cardboard packaging manufactured in Leeds, and ensure each piece meets our quality standards. 

This piece of lighting is:

• Made in Britain
• Exclusive Design
• Tested to British Standards
• Suitable for Standard Edison Screw or Bayonet light fittings
• Dimensions: W50, H30, D50cm, Approx 1kg

Abigail, the designer says "This is by far our most popular piece of lighting. People just love the oversized scale. As this lampshade has a huge 50cm diameter, its a great size for a statement piece, that and its striking and unusual patterns in shadow make it a real focal point in a room"

Fans of this piece include Scouse Bird, an emerging Liverpool icon who showed off her new lampshade on Instagram with the caption: “My new dramatic bedroom lightshade…It’s a local designer. Token homewares...it’s amazing up close” 

Due to popular request, the light fittings as pictured are now available as a kit to complete the look. Light Fittings are sourced from our merchant in Birmingham.

Payments are processed securely through PayPal for delivery within 3-5 days.

name: Cylinder - Art Deco Lighting, Tall Geometric Lamp Shade
description:
The Cylinder lamp shade captures the art deco style through contemporary design. This piece of lighting offers a dramatic centerpiece for living areas; destined to impress. Perfect for those who love to entertain and desire ambient light for relaxation.

Abigail, the designer says "This geometric lamp shade is the tallest lamp shade in the range with an impressive 60cm height. This tubular lamp shade is an ideal for rooms with tall ceilings, and looks particularly dramatic in narrow rooms such as landings and hallways. This lampshade fulfills its potential when arranged in dynamic, uniform cylindrical or linear clusters.”

The geometric dashed cut sections of pattern form a striking silhouette yet highlight the beautiful natural texture of the vellum beneath. Vellum was traditionally used to line pre war lampshades. This paper-based material is specially sourced to emulate the authentic aesthetic of vintage vellum yet manufactured to UK lighting safety standards.

The polypropylene sheet and vellum are laser cut from materials carefully selected by our supplier in Manchester. We then personally hand assemble them in our Liverpool studio through their unique clipping mechanisms to metal lamp shade rings; sourced from our supplier's factory in Hackney, London. 

We then package each light shade individually in our bespoke Token Homewares recycled cardboard packaging manufactured in Leeds, and ensure each piece meets our quality standards. 

This lamp shade is: 

• Made in Britain
• Exclusive in Design
• Tested to British Standards
• Suitable for Standard Edison Screw or Bayonet light fittings
• Dimensions: W20, H60, D20cm, Approx 500g

Due to popular request, the light fittings as pictured are now available as a kit to complete the look. Light Fittings are sourced from our merchant in Birmingham.

Payments are processed securely through PayPal for delivery within 3-5 days.

name: Taper - Art Deco Lighting, Geometric Lamp Shade
description:
The Taper lamp shade captures the art deco style through contemporary design. This piece of lighting offers a dramatic centerpiece for living areas; destined to impress. Perfect for those who love to entertain and desire ambient light for relaxation.

Abigail, the designer says "This geometric lamp shade is the most reminiscent of the Art Deco era in the range. The form, pattern and monochrome aesthetic pay homage to art deco, yet through modern manufacturing methods and unique styling becomes a piece of lighting for a contemporary interior. This up lighter is an ideal size for smaller rooms and particularly effective when hung in multiples, either in uniform or random clusters.”

The geometric dashed cut sections of pattern form a striking silhouette yet highlight the beautiful natural texture of the vellum beneath. Vellum was traditionally used to line pre war lampshades. This paper-based material is specially sourced to emulate the authentic aesthetic of vintage vellum yet manufactured to UK lighting safety standards.

The polypropylene sheet and vellum are laser cut from materials carefully selected by our supplier in Manchester. We then personally hand assemble them in our Liverpool studio through their unique clipping mechanisms to metal lamp shade rings; sourced from our supplier's factory in Hackney, London.

This piece of lighting is:

• Exclusive in Design
• Tested to British Standards
• Suitable for Standard Edison Screw or Bayonet light fittings
• Dimensions: W35, H40, D35cm, Approx 500g

name: Ceiling Lighting Kit
description:
All you need to complete the look with your new lampshade! This kit includes:

• 40cm Black Fabric Cable
• Black Ceiling Rose
• Black E27 Lampholder

* All electrical fittings should be installed by a professional.
